title: Pink Scarf
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Ah, this one looks cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>A pink scarf with pompoms? Ayumu-san, that really suits you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ahaha, but isn’t it a bit too childish looking?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Really? But it suits you, though...... Ah, I’m not saying you seem childish, Ayumu-san. Even if you think that scarf makes you look childish, I still think it suits you...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>T-Then, should I try it on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Do it! Do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, thank you. I actually really love this kind of design.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>If you love it, then it’ll suit you 100 percent! Come on, try it on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
